price: ពួកគេបានឆ្លើយថាៈ ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ ពួកយីងបានឃើញជីដូន ជីតារបស់ពួកយើងធ្វើដូចេ្នះ ។
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
